QuestData.Title: Blood of My Blood
QuestData.Description: As my darling $Gbrother:sister; has demonstrated, Elisande's decision to bring down the shield has sown unrest among the nightborne.$B$BLoyalists and demons march together in the streets. Fear and distrust grip our hearts. Family turns against family.$B$BI will help Thalyssra stir a new rebellion, but first we must deal with Anarys.$B$BI do not wish to spill the blood of my blood - only to help $Ghim:her; see reason.$B$BAnarys is likely brooding over our father's memorial. Bring $Ghim:her; to me alive.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Anarys Lunastre and deliver $Ghim:her; to Ly'leth Lunastre.
QuestData.CompletionText: Anarys could halt our efforts before they begin.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you. Now our work can begin.
